title: Friends fans have theory Monica got cleaning obsession due to Richard
text:
Fans have theory Monica’s cleaning obsession was intensified after dating Richard. (Pictures: NBC)

Remember the episode of Friends where Chandler discovers Monica has a secret closet full of junk? (It’s in episode 14 of season eight and is literally called The One With The Secret Closet if you want to go back and refresh your memory).

Well, one fan has noticed it wasn’t always the mess it became later on in the hit show’s run.

In episode 13 of season one (entitled The One with the Boobies), there’s a very brief scene of Monica in a towel and shower cap, but the secret closet in question is wide open for the world to see.

And it’s not actually the mess it’s made out to be in season eight.

Advertisement

Advertisement

So one fan of the show took to Reddit to share their hypothesis: ‘My theory has always been that she didn’t get super compulsive and obsessed with cleaning until after her failed relationships and dealing with the loss of her jobs and whatnot.’

‘I think it got to the tipping point after Richard and she just started piling things in there to deal and pretending that everything is fine [be]cause the rest of the apartment is spotless. Just throwing my ideas out there,’ they added.

Another fan responded: ‘This has ALWAYS bugged me. It looks fairly neat there, does it just accumulate over time and get progressively more in the s**t.’

Monica frantically cleaning (Picture: NBC)

Then one fan added their personal story: ‘That’s actually a pretty good theory, and one that I can personally relate to.’

‘I’ve always been compulsive and obsessed with organization to a degree but I and some of my friends/family noticed that it got a lot worse during my senior year of high school which was right after someone I cared about had betrayed me in a pretty awful way,’ they added.

In episode two of season one, Monica can be seen frantically cleaning her apartment in anticipation of the arrival of her parents, so it looks like she’s always had her cleaning habits.

Looks like we may never know what the truth is, but breakups certainly can be pretty life-changing.
